articles.author: Caroline Graham
articles.title: Michelle Obama shocks Bruce Springsteen fans as she takes to the stage with legendary rocker - Daily Mail
articles.description: Michelle Obama, who also played tambourine during the hit song Glory Days, took to the stage on Friday with Steven Spielberg's actress wife Kate Capshaw.
articles.content:
Bruce Springsteen's fans were astonished to find that former US First Lady Michelle Obama had jetted all the way to Barcelona for a surprise stint as The Boss's backing singer.
